originalText.text: We were introduced to Robert by a friend, who bought an apartment in New York with Robert's help 5 years ago. Like our friend, we also had a fantastic experience working with Robert. He showed us at least 30 apartments in the last several years. His expertise and dedication were evident throughout the entire process. He always offers his honest and comprehensive opinion on the properties we saw. From finding the perfect apartment, negotiating with the sellers, to navigating the complexities of closing, he went above and beyond. Always responsive and proactive, he made the journey smooth and enjoyable. We are very happy with our apartment and the deal we got. We highly recommend him to anyone in search of a knowledgeable and reliable real estate professional. We will definitely work with Robert again when we search for another condo in Manhattan.

originalText.text: I have known Robert since 2018 as an out-of-state parent shopping for a condo for our daughter in college.  Robert has been extremely professional, informative and dedicated throughout 5 years of purchase, remodel, and renting activities.  He is an excellent realtor, but he went way above and beyond, and is also a great source of references for other professional services such as legal and mortgage when purchasing in Manhattan.  As a result, I have recommended his services to four of our friends, and got unanimous feedback for his great knowledge, experience, strategic-thinking and client focus!  He is simply the best among many realtors I worked with in CA and NY in the past 25 years!  Thank you, Robert!

originalText.text: I have known and worked with Robert for more than ten years: he has handled my real property buying, selling, and rentals, and I never have to worry about a thing. He is proactive, attentive, thorough, and a joy to work with. When I have introduced him to my friends, they have loved him as well. Definitely my go-to person when it comes to real estate in NYC!

originalText.text: Robert has clients from around the globe. He understands the cultural difference and is a great negotiator. It's been 10 years since I known Robert and a great pleasure working with him. Cheers to more years of partnership. Strongly recommend Robert for his real estate expertise!
